plot: An isolated man is introduced to a groundbreaking system that allows its users to literally step inside old photographs - stirring powerful emotions in the process.

A middle-aged man, Phillip, is invited to share his memories of a deceased woman via a mental-virtual system that lets him "enter" old photos of her. But he destroyed her image from all of his photos, due to a fight and break-up they had decades ago.—Gislef

Aging Phillip is contacted regarding the death of a woman he once knew, Carol. As part of her funeral her relatives want to create a collection of memories of her using technology called Eulogy. Phillip reluctantly agrees to contribute. He discovers that the technology is an immersive experience and brings back many memories of Carol, some painful.—grantss
